thread.title: Concept Art Hints At Epic Scene In Upcoming Game Of Thrones Finale [Spoiler]
thread.title_full: Concept Art Hints At Epic Scene In Upcoming Game Of Thrones Finale [Spoiler]

author: Joseph Schmidt
title: Concept Art Hints At Epic Scene In Upcoming Game Of Thrones Finale [Spoiler]
text:
Concept Art Hints At Epic Scene In Upcoming Game Of Thrones Finale [Spoiler] Joseph Schmidt Start Photo Gallery Back to Article Image of 
A new piece of concept art from the production of Game of Thrones ’ seventh season has surfaced, hinting at some big events that could take place in the finale. 
Let’s get the big ole’ SPOILER WARNINGS out of the way right now in case you want to go into the new season blind. 
Last chance… UP NEXT: Dragons Return In New Game of Thrones Set Photos 
Ok, here we go. 
The Game of Thrones -centric news site Watchers on the Wall recently posted the artwork (via Reddit) which depicts the entrance to an area referred to as the Dragonpit. 
The report notes that the concept art lines up with previous set reports from on-location shooting, and that the setting will be a key location in the upcoming season. 
The artwork mixes photo-realistic characters and settings with renderings of the location, matching concept work from previous seasons. 
Most notable is the group of characters featured on the piece. Bronn and Tyrion Lannister will finally be reunited after the sellsword’s time with Jamie Lannister . 
The site also notes that the figure on the bottom appears to be Jon Snow , who will share his first scenes with Tyrion since they hung out at the Wall. (Photo: Watchers on the Wall) 
While the site assures these are indeed accurate, only time will tell if that’s the case. Game of Thrones’ seventh season is wrapping production now, with new episodes set to air later this year. 
Check out the gallery for a closer look at the artwork.
